channel.title: Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery short story, novella & novel website. Buy thrilling murder mystery & crime stories to read on any ebook device or app.

item.title: Easy Money men
item.dc:creator: Eric Howard
item.description: A panoramic view of New York's underworld, of studio life in Hollywood, of con men and dicks, of counterfeiters and government agents, of thieves and dips and jail birds, and a former chief of police who promotes a private detective bureau for the purpose of snaring all law-breakers, large and small.

item.title: The Case of the Tell-Tale Corpse

image.title: The Case of the Tell-Tale Corpse

item.description: When a dead body is found in the hold of the coaster Trojan, can Hawke prove that it's not murder?

item.title: A Snitch in Time
item.dc:creator: E. C. Marshall
item.description: Locked in a windowless room, in a secret building, this kidnaped magnate still found a dead sure way to trap his unknown captor.

item.title: Daughter of the Pigeon
item.dc:creator: Harry C. Hervey, Jr.
item.description: “The cave!” I shouted, pressing the knife into her hand and pointing to the nearby cavity.

item.title: The Explosive Gentleman
item.dc:creator: J. J. Stagg
item.description: Just how much nonsense do you expect nitroglycerine to stand for? It had been scratched, scraped, tossed about carelessly and stepped on. Now the hot end of a cigar was being applied to it. Can yon blame it for raising a splutter?

item.title: Weeping Killer
item.dc:creator: Harry M. Sutherland
item.description: When the old gang boss gets out of prison, will he or the new leader of the gang take a fall?

item.title: Voodoo on the Riviera
item.description: Up against the fearsome forces of Caribean voodoo, can Hawke and his assistant Tommy Burke defeat the forces of dark magic?

item.title: May and December
item.dc:creator: Frank Parks
item.description: Only seventeen, it was a forgone conclusion that she would marry Norton Terry, more than three times her age. But when he dies in agony, exhibiting all the symptoms of poisoning by arsenic, will it be a simple case of murder for inheritance, or is there a deeper motive?

item.title: The Runaway
item.dc:creator: Al Peters
item.description: The madame, who is a good many years younger than the master, has completely disappeared. The master's disposition is jealous; he was very jealous of the madame, because of his nature and because she, being much younger than he, liked to go out and enjoy herself, dancing and the like.

item.title: The Letter in the Mail
item.dc:creator: Alfred Plowman
item.description: Confession may be good for the soul but when bank clerk Philip Moore confesses his crime to his boss, will he find redemption or death?
